2:
After two days he will revive us;\q he will raise us up on the third day,
\q and we will live before him.
\q
3:
Let us know Yahweh;\q let us press on to know Yahweh.
\q His coming out is as sure as the dawn;
\q he will come to us like the showers,
\q like the spring rains that water the land."


\q
4:
Ephraim, what will I do with you?\q Judah, what will I do with you?
\q Your faithfulness is like a morning cloud,
\q like the dew that goes away early.
\q
5:
So I have cut them to pieces by the prophets,\q I have killed them with the words of my mouth.
\q Your decrees are like the light that shines out.


\q
6:
For I desire faithfulness and not sacrifice,\q and the knowledge of God more than burnt offerings.
\q
7:
Like Adam they have broken the covenant;\q they were unfaithful to me.


\q
8:
Gilead is a city of evildoers\q with footprints of blood.
\q
10:
In the house of Israel I have seen a horrible thing;\q Ephraim's prostitution is there, and Israel has become unclean.
\q
11: For you also, Judah, a harvest has been appointed,\q when I will restore the fortunes of my people.
